description: Detects suspicious mshta process patterns Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious MSHTA Process Patterns
query: (process.executable:*\\mshta.exe AND (((process.parent.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe) OR process.command_line:(*\\AppData\\Local* OR *C\:\\Windows\\Temp* OR *C\:\\Users\\Public*)) OR (NOT (process.executable:(*C\:\\Windows\\System32* OR *C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64*)))) OR (NOT (process.command_line:(*.htm* OR *.hta*) AND process.command_line:(*mshta.exe OR *mshta)))))
